Marin Bee Detox Masque

Brand: Marin Bee

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Vegetable Glycerin, California Wildflower Honey, Kaolin Clay, Sodium Chloride (Salt), Zinc Oxide, Sulfur, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract*, Lactobacillus/Pumpkin Ferment Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder*, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Lavandula Angustifo

Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol; *certified organic

Directions: Apply a thin layer of Detox Masque over the entireface, careful to avoid the eye area. After 10 minutes, remove with water. Use onselect areas of the body (backor chest) to detoxify and soothe. Apply se

and soothe. Apply several times a weekfor flawless radiant skin.

Warnings: n/a

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
